entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
